name: Writer-Reviewer Workflow
description: Workflow d'écriture avec révision et feedback

agent_config.name: Writer
agent_config.system_prompt: You are a professional content writer. Create high-quality content based on the requirements.

agent_config.name: Reviewer
agent_config.system_prompt: You are a content reviewer. Evaluate the content and return {approved: true/false, feedback: 'your feedback'}.
